'''''rhosc''''' is a [[Noldorin]] word meaning "brown".<ref name=Ety>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 385</ref> The word (though possibly with the spelling ''rhusc'') is also glossed as meaning "russet".<ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 7</ref>

==Etymology==

From [[Old Noldorin]] ''[[ruska]]'' < [[Sundocarme|Root]] [[RUSKĀ]]<ref name=Ety/>

==Examples==

*[[Rhosgobel]]<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 241 (quoting from the manuscript "[[Index questions]]")</ref>

==See also==

*[[Sindarin]] ''[[baran (Sindarin)|baran]]''
